Edited October 11, 2013 by zekes

I'll be dropping out of the Eve battle due to several unfinished ships and 4 people are hard to get working in any time.On the bright side zekes got to use the DrekXIV and I made a smart replacement(shredder)for the hades ADV,They might have 12 parts but they're worth it.

Ohmygods it's "persist"! That squiggly red line underneath the word means it's spelled incorrectly. This message brought to you by daeCorp, building a more grammatically-correct Internet.

I'm either a genius, or I'm insane. Possibly both. I think the armor on my Behemoth Mk II may outclass the Drek XIV's armor. It's zekes' armor method combined with mine. Let's see how well it works.

(I Claim victory in the Second Genesis War)

Stats:

Zokesia

missiles fired: Three 2.44 ton Pocket Missile Mk IIs

Hits: 2 major, 1 minor

Hits Recieved: 7

Damage recieved: Engine strike on Winged Serpent, Gun damage on Messenger Of Revenge.

Both are minor damage and can be repaired in orbit.

Ships marked "out of commission":

None

Project Genesis

missiles fired: Three Medium shipkiller missiles, 4 .5m HV missiles

Hits: 2 Minor, 5 superficial

Hits recieved: 3

Damage recieved: Total loss of Freedom, she is now a large peice of metal in Eve orbit. Total loss of Halo in much the same way, although she is still powered she has only 2 solar panels, an Ion engine, and a shipkiller missile. Marked as "kill", can be salvaged for scrap.

Both are minor damage and can be repaired in orbit.

Ships marked "out of commission":

Freedom

Halo

Final count:

Kills: 2-0 (Zokesia)

Powered ships: 3-2 (Zokesia) (Halo counts as "alive" although she is really a shattered hulk)

Mobile Ships: 2-1 (Zokesia)
